title: Tix2086-TicketForward via email_Auto acceptance applicable for an verified email without having a ticketing account
custom_preconds:
Email has to be verified
Mlb account without a ticketing account
custom_steps: Forward a ticket to the above preconditioned email
custom_expected:
Ticket has to be auto accepted
Sender and recipient should receive emails
new ticketing account should be created
linkedtype should be "ForwardCreateEmail"

title: Tix2086-TicketForward via link_Auto acceptance applicable for an verified email without having a ticketing account
Tix1579_Apple pass in wallet gets updated for mentioned fields
custom_preconds:
If there is a change to any of these field and user is having an apple for for the same event (NGE/Game), that apple pass should be updated with the modified information 
dateTime = updatedEvent.dateTime,
      localDate = updatedEvent.localDate,
      dateTBD = updatedEvent.dateTBD,
      time_zone_local = updatedEvent.time_zone_local,
      time_local = updatedEvent.time_local,
      purchaseSummary = updatedEvent.purchaseSummary,
      displaySummary = updatedEvent.displaySummary
custom_steps:
1. Create an apple pass to your wallet for an event ( using BP app)
2. Make changes to any of the above mentioned field
( you can change the date and time in TA2 for the event)
3. Clear the cache (https://qa.boxoffice.mlb.com/cache/clear?cacheID=admin-config)
3. If apple pass auto update is enable it should update the apple pass on your wallet
Or, you can manually trigger the invalidate (https://eris-dev.mlb.am/v1/passes/1000005380/invalidate)
Once the invalidate is complete
4. Pass should be updated with the new date and time
custom_expected: Pass should be updated with the new date and time

title: TIX-2300 Having PVO account with uppercase email while mlb login with lower case email
custom_preconds:
Create a ticketing account with Upper case email
https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?agency=MLBM_MYTIXX&orgid=48650#/user/profile

Ex. mlbticketingqa+Manual_ACCTPV02@gmail.com
custom_steps:
1. Create PVO sandbox account
2. Purchase ticket
3 log into BP with that ticket
custom_expected:
Account link should successfully happened
all email reference should be in lower cases
